RoleType.description: A RoleType represents the type of a PartyRole, defined in the context of a given type of partnership, such as Buyer, Seller.

description.description: An explanatory text documenting the role type

name.description: The name of the role type.

requiresBilling.description: Indicates whether billing operations will be associated to parties playing the role

requiresSettlement.description: Indicates whether settlement operations will be associated to parties playing the role
